meanings.definition: A ringing or buzzing in the ears.
meanings.sent1: The tinnituses in his ears made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: She visited the doctor to get relief from the tinnituses in her ears.
meanings.sent3: The tinnituses in his ears were like tiny alarm clocks going off randomly.
meanings.sent4: The tinnituses in her ears were a constant reminder of the noisy city she lived in.
meanings.sent5: The high-pitched tinnituses in his ears were as persistent as a mosquito buzzing around.

meanings.definition: The sensation of noise or ringing in the ears.
meanings.sent1: He described the tinnituses in his ears as a constant high-pitched sound.
meanings.sent2: The tinnituses she experienced were distracting during quiet moments.
meanings.sent3: The tinnituses in his ears seemed to have a mind of their own, starting and stopping at random.
meanings.sent4: The tinnituses in her ears echoed like distant church bells on a quiet evening.
meanings.sent5: The tinnituses in his ears were as loud as a fire alarm, but only he could hear them.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by ringing or buzzing in the ears.
meanings.sent1: Living with chronic tinnituses can be challenging for many people.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the causes of her tinnituses and possible treatments.
meanings.sent3: His tinnituses were so persistent that he joked about having a built-in alarm system.
meanings.sent4: The tinnituses in her ears were a symphony of high and low pitches, never quite in tune.
meanings.sent5: The tinnituses in his ears felt like a never-ending soundtrack to his daily life.
